reviewText: 4 amazing movies for one great price!  Convenient because two movies are are one dvd!  Great for snowy, cold days!
These are all great movies.  I got this because I had lost my copies of Love Actually and Notting Hill.  Love Actually is the movie that i got this for but getting the others is a bonus
It is nice to have them in one place - I can pull them out for a night when I really need funny, romantic & feel-good.
The disk would play half of the mvoie for notting hill and doesnt even play because I said so. Just sayin the mvies are great though

I have to say that I haven't yet watched "definitely, maybe" or "because I said so," but they can only be added value to two of my fave films, "Notting Hill" and "Love, Actually."  I have to watch "Love, Actually" every Christmastime, or it isn't Christmas.  Great value.
Very nice set. I gave it as a gift to my daughter, and she loves it & her friends describe it as the best boxed set ever. Arrived quickly, and in excellent shape.

Bought this set of DVD's because it has Love Actually and Notting Hill.  These are such fun movies and it was less expensive to buy them this way than on individual DVDs.

If you're thinking that the other two movies will be on a par with these, well, you're going to be disappointed.  The other two are -- well, let me speak plainly -- duds.  Diane Keaton should erase Because I Said So from her resume.  And Definitely, Maybe is pretty low-standard, too.

But for fans of Love Actually and Notting Hill, this is a good buy.  Just pretend the other two movies aren't there.
I really love this movie combo.  I was worried they would try and cram them in all 1 disc, but it's actually 3 discs.  Only 2 are on 1 disc.
Love these movies.
great movies

Love these movies
delivered on time
Really happy with this DVD.Shipped within 2 days,and so excited to get it.
For romantic comedy lovers, this is a great 4-Pack.
Great product, fast delivery
great rainy weekend movies
4 Great movies for the price---can't beat it.
Just replacing movies lost in the fire....
Good movie
Enjoy these movies.
All movies play perfectly!
great movies
thanks!
Nice to finally get those chick flicks in a group
good movies
Great group of movies!  Love Actually is my favorite holiday movie, and I got the rest of these "free" for no more than the sole movie would have been.  They're all great!
thanks

I really like the packs where you get more movies, especially when they are good movies and this one has four great movies. My favorite is "Because I Said So" with Diane Keaton. I'm not one to watch movies more then once but this one is so well done and funny that it is an exception to my rule.
some of the movies were very good.  Thanks.
I love "Love Actually", one of my favorite  movies. I watch it over and over again.
Came in great condition
Good
As listed.
Perfect date night movies all in one package.
Works as advertised.

My order was for brand NEW DVDs.  The DVDs were corrupted and no data was readable by my devices.  The hologram coloring on the backs were faded as if they had baked in the sun!!! Some disks were not flat and could not be read. I was so very dissapointed!  The bottom line is that the DVD's were dying of old age and or use.

I bought these DVDs to watch 'Love Actually' on Christmas. Our holiday was miserable, and the ONLY thing I wanted that day was to view the film. After fiddling with the DVDs for quite a while, I just told my spouse to forget it and went to bed. Seller was not helpful at all.
A bunch of movies to make your SO cry for less than $10.  Sold.
These are 4 really fun movies. My husband and I have seen them several times and still are enjoying them.
HILARIOUS! I am a big fan of romantic comedy's. These are an excellent combination. Except for some nudity and bad language these are great pics for a Saturday Chic Flick Night with lots of popcorn.
I LOVE LOVE ACCUALY and its just a bonus to pay a couple bucks more and get 3 more movies.
Four great movies!  I bought this just to get Love Actually so the others are a welcome bonus!
Great! Thanks again
Great movieS
Great 4 some
No complaints here!
Good collection of love stories-  Can't go wrong with this collection.  The price is right.
Love every movie.
I have already watched 2 of the 4 (loveactually and Notting Hill) which I have seen them both before but they are good to watch over and over again.
I love these movies. Four of my favorite movies together in one pack.

I knew that I already liked 2 of the films and the other 2 sounded just as good if not better.  This is a great way to purchase DVD's, they may all seem like they are on the same disc but actually they were on 3 disks and the holder keeps them for sliding against each other.  I hope they conitinue to market DVD's like this.  I really enjoy each movie on it's own and this is much cheaper than purchasing even 2 of the movies alone.  Good quality disk's,  Thanks for buying from a buyer that did such a.
Love Actually is one of the great movies of this new century. Bill Nighy's performance MAKES this so. But everyone else was wonderful.
Fun flicks.
They are "feel good" chick flick, but the actors are great.
My favorite is Love Actually, maybe one of my favorite movies of all time, Notting Hill is Excellent,  can't wait to see the other ones.  Fantastic collection.
I bought this DVD because I like romantic comedies.  I love Julia Roberts and the other actors.  Truthfully?  I haven't watched the DVD yet, but I'm sure I will love it.
It doesn't get any better than Ryan Reynolds, Hugh Grant and Julia Roberts.  Hugh Grant hits the mark in every movie.

The package came over two weeks late after I tried to reach out to the shippers to expedite it and pay an extra fee.  No one got back to me and my friend who was sick and could have used the gift to take her mind off of the pain received it two weeks after she recovered.  Waste of $.
All four movies are great!  I couldn't believe they packaged all 4 of these gems for such a low price.  Will watch over and over.  Love the romantic comedies, and these are 4 classics.
I bought this to basically just get Notting Hill for cheap. I watched the other movies and liked them, surprisingly. 4 movies for that price is a steal. Would recommend as great mother's day present.
My favorite movies I was happy to find this set. I really liked Notting Hill the most.  Thanks for offering it.
...love them all.  I purchased this set to watch while I work - they're fantastic, shipped fast, and were in excellent condition.  Would definitely purchase again.
This is worth it for either Love Actually or Notting Hill alone but the other movies are good too. Good value too.

I bought this because I wanted Love Actually and Notting Hill and what a great deal to get 2 more movies for $8!  They are good movies as well!  4 movies for $8.....why yes I think I will!  Thank you very much!

I bought this because it was a great four movie deal. Love Actually is one of my favorite movies. I thoroughly enjoyed Notting Hill. I have not seen the other two movies. But what a bonus to have them on the same DVD.

The disk which was included, housing the four movies purchased, was a disk that was unplayable in my Country. The page which had the information for this item has no information on which areas of the world the disk is playable.
I'm a huge fan of Hugh Grant, Julia Roberts, Bill Nighy, Colin Firth, Liam Neeson and Emma Thompson.  A romp in the park!

I have wanted to own Definitely, Maybe and Love Actually ever since I saw both movies on Satellite TV! Having them accompanied by Because I Said So and Notting Hill was just icing on the cake. Definitely a good value for the money!!
Great movies, perfect price! Absolutely love Love, Actually! Sets like these make movies affordable to own and not have to rely on streaming services.
Had to return it. One of the DVD's was defective. Too bad.  Good romantic comedies were in the collection, but the vendor could not replace the defective disc.
great
Love all these movies.
Only movie in case
Great!  A perfect gift.
Great movies! Great stocking stuffer!
Great product, just as described.
Love Actually and Notting Hill are great. Definitely, Maybe is awful. Haven't watched Because I Said So yet.
4 solid movies, lots of fun, cheap
